snippet: After a main supplier for Apple gave a disappointing revenue forecast, investors worried about weakening demand for the iPhone and iPad. After a main supplier for Apple gave a disappointing revenue forecast, investors worried about weakening demand...
abstract: Stock market falls in broad sell-off, led by sharp drop in shares of Apple on worries about slowing demand for its products.
lead_paragraph: After a main supplier for Apple gave a disappointing revenue forecast, investors worried about weakening demand for the iPhone and iPad. After a main supplier for Apple gave a disappointing revenue forecast, investors worried about weakening demand for the iPhone and iPad.

headline.main: Apple and Bank of America Lead Market Downturn
headline.print_headline: Apple and Bank of America Lead Market Downturn
